title: Degenerated cases of representations of graphs

blocks.name: vtxval0
blocks.content: Degenerated case 1 for vertices: The set of vertices of the empty set is the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 24-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: iedgval0
blocks.content: Degenerated case 1 for edges: The set of indexed edges of the empty set is the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 24-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: vtxvalsnop
blocks.content: Degenerated case 2 for vertices: The set of vertices of a singleton containing an ordered pair with equal components is the singleton containing the component. (Contributed by AV, 24-Sep-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Jul-2022.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)

blocks.name: iedgvalsnop
blocks.content: Degenerated case 2 for edges: The set of indexed edges of a singleton containing an ordered pair with equal components is the singleton containing the component. (Contributed by AV, 24-Sep-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Jul-2022.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)

blocks.name: vtxval3sn
blocks.content: Degenerated case 3 for vertices: The set of vertices of a singleton containing a singleton containing a singleton is the innermost singleton. (Contributed by AV, 24-Sep-2020.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)

blocks.name: iedgval3sn
blocks.content: Degenerated case 3 for edges: The set of indexed edges of a singleton containing a singleton containing a singleton is the innermost singleton. (Contributed by AV, 24-Sep-2020.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)

blocks.name: vtxvalprc
blocks.content: Degenerated case 4 for vertices: The set of vertices of a proper class is the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 12-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: iedgvalprc
blocks.content: Degenerated case 4 for edges: The set of indexed edges of a proper class is the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 12-Oct-2020.)
